casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jaamall D. OGLESBY. No. 683P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 12, 2005. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Chapel Hill, for Jaamall D. Oglesby. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 12th day of December 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of December 2005."
